title: Offline mode
body: Can we make a League of legends off line mode for those days when your internet go out and you just wanna play or when you just don't want to be disturbed

replies.body: Never going to happen. Part of the game's security is preventing hackers from analysing the server-side code. Also, an offline mode will pave the way for people to make League of Legends private servers that don't suck balls. Both these things are things Riot wants to stop from happening.
The moment League becomes an offline game is the moment hackers will start invading the client.

It's important to note that they already do.

Care to remember the script bug exploits from last year?
